summary: Completed frontend testing for font size updates across all pages. All requested changes verified working: 1) Quest descriptions on Dashboard are text-base (16px), 2) Wallet account descriptions are text-sm (14px), 3) Store item descriptions are text-sm (14px), 4) Achievement descriptions are text-sm (14px), 5) Tips sections on all pages are text-base (16px), 6) Quest descriptions on QuestsPage are text-base (16px), 7) Investment page tips are text-base (16px), 8) Learn page header subtitle is text-base (16px).

✅ Dashboard wallet description is 16px (text-base) - 'Your ₹ is organized in 4 special jars. Tap any jar to see more or move money between them!'
✅ Wallet page tips section is 16px (text-base) - 'This is like your very own digital piggy bank!'
✅ Store page banner is 16px (text-base) - 'This is your very own practice store...'
✅ Store page tips are 16px (text-base) - 'Compare prices before buying...'
✅ Store item descriptions are 14px (text-sm) - 'Crunchy orange carrots - good for your eyes!'
✅ Achievements page tips are 16px (text-base) - 'Savings badges: Save ₹ in your savings account'
✅ Achievement descriptions are 14px (text-sm) - 'Save your first coin!', 'Save 100 coins in your savings'
✅ Quests page banner is 16px (text-base) - 'Quests are fun missions...'
✅ Quest descriptions are 16px (text-base) - 'Move 10 coins to your savings account', 'Compare prices and find the better deal'
✅ Quests page tips are 16px (text-base) - 'Daily quests reset each day...'
✅ Investment page banner is 16px (text-base) - 'Here you can buy tiny pieces of pretend companies...'
✅ Investment page tips are 16px (text-base) - 'Diversify your portfolio! Owning different types of stocks...'
✅ Learn page header subtitle is 16px (text-base) - 'Explore fun money lessons!'
✅ Learn page explanation banner is 16px (text-base) - 'Click on any topic below to start learning!'

context_for_next_testing_agent: All font size changes verified: text-base (16px) for quest descriptions, tips sections, explanation banners across Dashboard, Wallet, Store, Achievements, Quests, Investment, and Learn pages. text-sm (14px) for compact descriptions like store items and achievement descriptions. All changes are working as expected for better readability for children.
